# job_status


Current status of a job




## Description

Get the status of a job, as an  list.





## Usage
```r
job_status(job = "latest")
```




## Arguments


Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
job | Job name or job object. Pass "latest" to indicate the most recently submitted job.
